1.0.0.text: Initial fork from KhtNotes using custom version of PyOtherSide

1.1.2.text: Fix incorrect font size of the editor

1.2.0.text: Fix rehighlighting bug generating utf8 decode error

1.2.2.text: Fix encoding error in notes list view

1.2.3.text: Release version bump as previous didn't display right version

1.2.4.text: Add a workarround for link color in About

1.2.6.text: Fix a bug in delete between list refresh and remorse item
Add sync and new feature to cover, and sync indicator
Fix a bug in unlock at end of a sync
Fix refreshing bug after creating a new note

1.2.7.text: Replace busycircle on Cover for a label
Use pull down busy instead of ugly progress bar

1.5.0.text: Use a real markdown parser with QSyntaxHighligher
Translations : Chinese, Finnish, French, Russian, Dutch

1.5.1.text: Fix error on displaying Authentification Error

1.5.2.text: Put git commit log in changelog via release script

1.5.3.text: Fix pulley menu always showing Syncing label
